question.sparql: PREFIX umbel-rc: #lthttp://umbel.org/umbel/rc/#gt SELECT DISTINCT (str(?{parameter1})) as ?{parameter1} ?{parameter2} WHERE { ?actor rdf:type umbel-rc:Actor. ?actor rdfs:label ?{parameter2} . ?actor dbo:thumbnail ?{parameter1} . ?actor foaf:gender ?gender . filter(langMatches(lang(?{parameter2}),"EN")) filter(?gender="male"@en)} OFFSET {offset} LIMIT 20

PREFIX umbel-rc: #lthttp://umbel.org/umbel/rc/#gt SELECT DISTINCT (str(?{parameter1})) as ?{parameter1} ?{parameter2} WHERE { ?actor rdf:type umbel-rc:Actor. ?actor rdfs:label ?{parameter2} . ?actor dbo:thumbnail ?{parameter1} . ?actor foaf:gender ?gender . filter(langMatches(lang(?{parameter2}),"EN")) filter(?gender="female"@en)} OFFSET {offset} LIMIT 20

question.text: In which year actor {parameter1} started career ?
question.sparql: PREFIX umbel-rc: #lthttp://umbel.org/umbel/rc/#gt SELECT ?{parameter1} , ?{parameter2} WHERE { ?actor rdf:type umbel-rc:Actor. ?actor rdfs:label ?{parameter1} . ?actor dbo:activeYearsStartYear ?{parameter2} . filter(langMatches(lang(?{parameter1}),"EN")) } OFFSET {offset} LIMIT 20

PREFIX umbel-rc: #lthttp://umbel.org/umbel/rc/#gt SELECT DISTINCT ?{parameter1} , ?{parameter2} WHERE { ?actor rdf:type umbel-rc:Actor. ?actor rdfs:label ?{parameter1} . ?actor dbo:birthDate ?{parameter2} . filter(langMatches(lang(?{parameter1}),"EN")) } OFFSET {offset} LIMIT 20

question.text: Who is actor and director of {parameter1} ?
question.sparql: SELECT DISTINCT ?{parameter1} , (concat(?writerLabel, " : ",?directorLabel)) as ?{parameter2} WHERE { ?movie rdf:type dbo:Film . ?movie rdfs:label ?{parameter1} . ?movie dbo:writer ?writer . ?writer rdfs:label ?writerLabel . ?movie dbo:director ?director . ?director rdfs:label ?directorLabel . filter(langMatches(lang(?{parameter1}),"EN")) . filter(langMatches(lang(?writerLabel),"EN")) . filter(langMatches(lang(?directorLabel),"EN")) . } OFFSET {offset} LIMIT 20
